argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | shlesb1.1 | |- A e. SH |
| 2 |  | shlesb1.2 | |- B e. SH |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_shsval2i | |- ( A +H B ) = |^| { x e. SH | ( A u. B ) C_ x } |
| 4 | 1 | #P_shssii | |- A C_ ~H |
| 5 | 2 | #P_shssii | |- B C_ ~H |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_unssi | |- ( A u. B ) C_ ~H |
| 7 |  | #P_spanval | |- ( ( A u. B ) C_ ~H -> ( span ` ( A u. B ) ) = |^| { x e. SH | ( A u. B ) C_ x } ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( span ` ( A u. B ) ) = |^| { x e. SH | ( A u. B ) C_ x } |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( A +H B ) = ( span ` ( A u. B ) ) |
